title: Textile, 1914–22
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block-printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Pattern of pineapple-like forms, thickly outlined in black, with black and gray diamond filling and gray and white leaves, interspersed with squares of pink and black diamonds.
